TEXT.TITLE: NOVELL <NOVL> SETS PAYMENT DATE FOR STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Novell Inc said the dividend to effect its previously announced two-for-one stock split will be distributed April 13. As stated at the time of the original announcement, the company said the payment will be made to holders of record March 31. Reuter
